item.title: CVE-2021-21505|2024-09-17T02:16:42.090Z -- dell -- dell%20emc%20integrated%20system%20for%20microsoft%20azure%20stack%20hub
item.description: Dell EMC Integrated System for Microsoft Azure Stack Hub, versions 1906 â€“ 2011, contain an undocumented default iDRAC account. A remote unauthenticated attacker, with the knowledge of the default credentials, could potentially exploit this to log in to the system to gain root privileges.
